message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it's worth a lot, but I'm willing to start the bidding at $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $200 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $175 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a bit closer to $190. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $175. Would you be willing to meet me at $180?
